name: PHILADELPHIA® New York Cheesecake
author: Philadelphia
summary: This classic cheesecake topped with cherries is a special occasion indulgence that will serve a crowd.
ingredients: 1 cup HONEY MAID Graham Cracker Crumbs
5 (8 ounce) packages PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1 cup BREAKSTONE'S or KNUDSEN Sour Cream
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F if using a silver 9-inch springform pan (or to 300 degrees F if using a dark nonstick 9-inch springform pan)
sugar and butter; press firmly onto bottom of pan
Beat cream cheese, 1 cup sugar, flour and vanilla with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended
Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended
Bake 1 hour 10 minutes or until center is almost set
Run knife or metal spatula around rim of pan to loosen cake; cool before removing rim of pan
Top with pie filling before serving
